title: The KiZZ-80`s-Joanna Pacula
description:
Movie Description
25 years ago, Felice (Joanna Pacula, GORKY PARK), took a trip to the Belgian Congo as a young girl. She endured a mysterious supernatural experience which would change her forever. Now a sensuous fashion model, she appears in New York to visit her niece, Amy (Meredith Salenger, THE JOURNEY OF NATTY GANN). Amy is excited to meet her famous aunt, but when dead bodies begin turning up all over town, her excitement gives way to horror as she realizes she is about to become heir to a horrifying family legacy.

Credits 
Cast: Joanna Pacula 
Director: Pen Densham 

Synopsis
A mysterious woman insinuates herself into the lives of a suburban family in order to pass on her black magic powers to their young daughter.

Film Notes

Not to be confused with the 1929 silent film, "The Kiss," which starred Greta Garbo and Lew Ayres.

Industry Reviews
"...It&#039;s smart, fast and sassy, as much fun as it is scary in its shock-cut grisliness....The film makers are adept at playing the most bizarre and grisly happenings against an atmosphere of the utmost normality..."
Los Angeles Times - Kevin Thomas (10/14/1988)
